document_data.mainbody:
ine Lords Errant was a play written by Narelra Manecandle of Athkatla in the late 14 century DR.
Narelra Manecandle, Playwright of Athkatla, penned the Nine Lords Errant play sometime before the . The plays first performance was held in 1380 DR. The plays protagonist was Amlaric Amend-All, who, along with several coconspirators, plotted a murder most foul.
